name: Dungeon of RNG
description:
Summary: Dungeon of RNG is a Roguelike all about exploring constantly changing dungeons, filled with a variety of different enemies and treasures to find. Equipped with an arsenal of weapons, you must go deeper and deeper down, fighting wave after wave of enemies, how far can you survive? can you defeat the boss?

Gameplay: Each time you play the layout of each level will be different, this means that finding the exit will be tricking and you never know what will be through each door. Level up and allocate points to upgrade your character.

Controls: Standard W,A,S and D to move, left click to swing your almighty sword, Right click to use your bow(be careful as you only have a limited amount of arrows), press Q to use a potion that you can collected from chests that will offer you a temporary boost when in need.
